thread.section_title: Regenersis Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of regenersis.com
thread.title: Jonathan

author: Jonathan
title: Jonathan
text: Broke screen on my brand new oneplus3 and was a little concerned that I had to ship to regenersis in Poland arranged by oneplus service desk. Took a while to inspect and cost had to be paid by bank transfer in EUR, but the phone arrived bang on 10 working days after sending in a like new condition with a free case in original packaging. Good value and wouldn't worry about using again
